title: Rep. French Hill, Eco Outlook, Stimulus
itunes:title: Rep. French Hill, Eco Outlook, Stimulus
description:
Guests: Congressman Rep French Hill, a Republican representing Arkansas’ 2nd district, Josh Wingrove, Bloomberg White House reporter, Mattie Duppler, Founder of Forward Strategies, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and former Former Coalitions Director for the House Republican Conference, and Hagar Chemali, CEO of Greenwich Media Strategies and former Treasury spokesperson for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
